data.name: enabled
data.description: Enables or disables the drift configuration

data.name: basedir
data.description: The root directory from which snapshots will be generated during drift monitoring.

data.name: interval
data.description: The frequency in seconds in which drift monitoring should run. Defaults to thirty minutes.

data.name: includes
data.description: A set of patterns that specify files and/or directories to include.

data.name: path
data.description: A file system path that can be a directory or a file. The path is assumed to be relative to the base directory of the drift configuration.
